title: FS: T206 Lot includes Griffith - Cards added 6/27
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Lot includes Griffith - Cards added 6/27
posts.post_content:
Asking $200 delivered; paypal preferred.  See additional condition observations that may not visible on scans.  LMK if you need additional scans:
Bob Bescher (Hands In Air) - PB - light vertical crease between hands to left elbow
Chappie Charles - P350 - no creases; slight paper loss right border on back
Clark Griffith (Batting) - SC460-25 - light horizontal crease from bat through hat
Otto Knabe - SC350-30 - visible crease top right; light crease top left
Bill Lattimore - P350 - vertical crease through middle of card
Tommy Leach (Bending Over - 460-25 - wrinkle at hat and bottom left front
Admiral Schlei (Catching) - P150 - very light crease center of card to bottom border
Jimmy Sheckard (Glove Showing) - PB - no creases; fleck of paper loss on grandstand
Kaiser Wilhelm (Hands At Chest) - P150 - very small crease at left front border
